artist: Artist: Wilber H. Schilling; Author: Michael Dennis Browne; Publisher: Indulgence Press, Minneapolis
creditline: Gift of funds from Diane and David Lilly
description: wood covers; twine binding; title in silver on cover; light grey folded pages with blue and grey type; poems with several photographs (landscapes, predominately) printed in blue; blue cloth-covered clamshell box
dimension: 4 1/4 x 6 1/8 x 1 13/16 in. (10.8 x 15.56 x 4.6 cm) (book only, closed)
medium:
Artist's book: cyanotype photographic prints, letterpress on pale gray MacGregor &
Vinzani handmade paper; bound with exposed cords laced into red oak boards; housed in an indigo-dyed paper over boards and blue goatskin clamshell box
signed: on colophon page at back, in pencil: [Chip H. Schilling] and [Michael Dennis Browne]
title: Panthers
